MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in Grassfield  Way and surrounding areas. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a suspected fuse failure. Our team will investigate the fault and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.31PM on 12th January 2021.
